import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-portfolio', templateUrl: './portfolio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./portfolio.component.css'] }) export class PortfolioComponent { petIllustration = ` `; }

Complete Pet Care Coverage

From routine checkups to emergency surgery, we've got your furry family covered.

Accidents & Illnesses

Emergency vet visits, surgeries, medications, and treatments for covered conditions.

  • • Broken bones
  • • Cancer treatment
  • • Digestive issues
  • • Allergies

Preventive Care

Annual wellness visits and routine care to keep your pet healthy.

  • • Annual checkups
  • • Vaccinations
  • • Flea & tick prevention
  • • Dental cleanings

Emergency Care

24/7 emergency vet visits and urgent care when your pet needs it most.

  • • Emergency surgery
  • • Poisoning treatment
  • • Hit by car
  • • Foreign object ingestion

How Lemonade Pet Works

Simple, fast, and transparent pet insurance.

1

Get Quote

Tell us about your pet and get an instant quote.

2

Choose Plan

Select the coverage that's right for your furry friend.

3

Visit Vet

Take your pet to any licensed vet in the US.

4

Get Reimbursed

Submit your claim and get paid back fast.

Simple, Transparent Pricing

Choose the plan that fits your pet and budget.

Base Plan

$20
per month
  • Accidents & illnesses
  • 80% reimbursement
  • $10,000 annual limit
Most Popular

Extra Plan

$35
per month
  • Everything in Base Plan
  • Preventive care package
  • 90% reimbursement
  • Unlimited annual limit
